title: Ola Verde
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Italian, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian-friendly restaurant in a country where veggie restaurants are few and far between. Menu lists the veg choices - see website. Has tofu, gluten-free, also vegan desserts. Dishes like mujadara, curries, humus, babagenouj and falafels. Directions: from 1st entry to Las Colinas, go 70 meters east from the stop light.
